name: Tea's Dream
method: Add all ingredients in a cocktail shaker without ice, stir so that the Caramel Syrup dissolves, then add the ice and shake. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
note: A pinch of salt is optional.
ingredientsAndQuantities: Vodka - 45 ml, Caramel Syrup - 45 ml, Baileys Irish Cream - 10 ml
